      • getNrOpenFiles

        public static int getNrOpenFiles()
                          throws IOException,
                                 InterruptedException,
                                 ExecutionException,
                                 TimeoutException
        get the number of open files by current java process.
        Returns:
        -1 if cannot get nr of open files
        Throws:
        IOException - - IO exception while accessing procfs.
        InterruptedException - - interrupted.
        ExecutionException - - execution exception while invoking lsof.
        TimeoutException - - timeout while obtaining info.

      • gc

        public static boolean gc(long timeoutMillis)
        Attempts to run the GC in a verifiable way.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - - timeout for GC attempt
        Returns:
        true if GC executed for sure, false otherwise, gc might have been executed though, but we cannot be sure.
